preface.title: Preface
preface.para: If you have questions regarding this package, please contact your support team (support@otrs.com) for more information.

sect1.title: Badges
sect1.para: Counters for Locked, Watched, Responsieble displayed in iPhone application main screen.

sect1.title: Queue View
sect1.para: All necesary information to fill iPhone application "Queue View" including Queue names and number of viewable tickets.

sect1.title: Status View
sect1.para: All necesary information to fill iPhone application "Status View" including State names and number of viewable tickets.

sect1.title: Escalation View
sect1.para: All necesary information to fill iPhone application "Escalation View" including Today, Tomorrow and Next Week ecalation times and number of viewable tickets.

sect1.title: Watched View
sect1.para: All necesary information to fill iPhone application "Watched View" including Queue names and number of viewable watched tickets.

sect1.title: Locked View
sect1.para: All necesary information to fill iPhone application "Locked View" including Queue names and number of viewable locked tickets.

sect1.title: Responsible View
sect1.para: All necesary information to fill iPhone application "Locked View" including Queue names and number of viewable responsible for tickets.

sect1.title: Ticket Phone
sect1.para: Create a new phone ticket.

sect1.title: Ticket Note
sect1.para: Create a new note to an existing ticket.

sect1.title: Ticket Close
sect1.para: Close an existing ticket.

sect1.title: Ticket Compose
sect1.para: Reply an existing ticket.

sect1.title: Ticket Move
sect1.para: Change an existing ticket from one queue to another.
